column5: Does anyone know if the ice conditions in Haliburton County are still good?
I was out on the Easter Weekend, lots of ice but shorelines with the afternoon sun are very sketchy.
Thanks Chris, I might check out a smaller lake this weekend.
I was on Koshlong 2 nights ago: ice tight to shore on 90% of the shoreline, 18" of ice at the holes we checked. Open water is still refreezing on most nights.
I was in Gooderham last weekend. Lots of ice around there still.
Looks like I will be still ice fishing this weekend then.
